document_data.name: Ship Rethnor
document_data.leader:
[[Rethnor]] (until [[1376 DR]])
[[Kensidan|Kensidan Rethnor]] (from [[1376 DR]])
[[Borlann]] ([[1450 DR]])
[[Hartouchen Rethnor]] (by [[1463 DR]])
document_data.mainbody: '''Ship Rethnor''' was one of the five factions of [[Luskan]] ruled by a [[High Captains (Luskan)|High Captain]]. It was named for and originally led by High Captain [[Rethnor]].
document_data.Relationships: In [[1376 DR]], the [[dwarf]] [[Athrogate]], was employed by High Captain [[Kensidan|Kensidan Rethnor]] as a guard and informant. That implied a connection to the [[drow]] mercenary group [[Bregan D'aerthe]], since Athrogate was known to work with [[Jarlaxle]], the leader of Bregan D'aerthe.
document_data.History:
Ship Rethnor was originally founded by [[Rethnor]].<ref name="VoloN-p111" >

In [[1376 DR]], the current captain died and his son, [[Kensidan|Kensidan the Crow]] became the new High Captain.

As of [[1483 DR]], thugs from Ship Rethnor demanded tolls from any who wished to cross the crumbling [[Upstream Span]].{{Cite digital book/The Companions/Kindle||26-27}}

Sometime before the [[1489 DR|Year of the Warrior Princess, 1489 DR]], Hartouchen became the High Captain and took Rethnor as his surname.
document_data.Members:
* [[Hartouchen Rethnor]], leader by [[1463 DR]]
* [[Borlann]], former leader
* [[Rethnor]], former leader
* [[Kensidan|Kensidan the Crow]], former leader
